Articles.Content:
Can this run RSS/RO?

i5

NVIDIA GeForce 820M

4 GB of RAM

If it could what visual settings should i use? Should i use visual enhancements?

What KSP version are you running?

And what i5?

Although I wouldn't recommend visual enhancements if youre going to install RSS.

And also run KSP in glmode or with dx11

It might have some problems if you only have 4GB of RAM. I would try it and see how it works, though. Also, make sure to download the lowest texture pack for RSS. The higher ones will slow down your computer.
